name: Magimail(マギメイル)
description:
A game about shooting and mail

Keyboard controls
C and K simulate the 1 button
X and J simulate the 3 button
WASD and Arrows simulate the 8 4 2 and 6 buttons
Return and Esc simulate the 0 button

0 resets save data
1 exits fullscreen
2 toggles audio
3 and Space cycle through palettes

Made by Zahran Worrell & King Worrell in 5 days for NokiaJam3

(don't be surprised if something unexpectedly glitchy happens along the way)
